refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The AgsSequencer interface gives you a unique access to MIDI devices.

refsect2.title: ags_sequencer_list_cards ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve card_id and card_name as a list of strings.

refsect2.title: ags_sequencer_play ()
refsect2.para: Plays the current buffer of sequencer.

refsect2.title: ags_sequencer_record ()
refsect2.para: Records the current buffer of sequencer.

refsect2.title: ags_sequencer_stop ()
refsect2.para: Stops the sequencer from playing to it.

refsect2.title: ags_sequencer_tic ()
refsect2.para: Callback when counter expires minor note offset.

refsect2.title: The offset-changed signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AgsSequencer *sequencer, guint note_offset, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: The ::offset-changed signal notifies about changed position within notation.

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The tic signal
refsect2.para: The ::tic signal is emitted every tic of the sequencer. This notifies about a newly played buffer.

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.
